mapper.insert: insert into tb_sys_business_log (idcard_no, name, device_no, descrip, oper_time, oper_ip, status, business_no, return_info, request_args,bz) values (#{idcardNo}, #{name}, #{deviceNo}, #{descrip}, NOW(), #{operIp}, #{status}, #{businessNo}, #{returnInfo}, #{requestArgs},#{bz})
insert into tb_interface_log (business_no, jymc, param, return_info, create_time, update_time, serviceurl) values (#{businessNo}, #{jymc}, #{param}, #{returnInfo}, NOW(), NOW(), #{serviceurl})
